Name: Twig & Flipper
About the game: . Twig & Flipper is a 2D platformer With the ability to Run or Fly. The game follows the hero 'Twig', a crow who can take on a human form or a bird form and his journey to find his best friend 'Flipper' a magical fox, who has been taken by Demons that have invaded Earth. The game features: - 20+ Levels with Boss battles and many enemies to keep you on your game. - Destructible terrain, mine the ground to find gold and other materials to level up your characters abilities! - Deadly weaponry. Shoot, blow and slash your way through the demon filled world. - Seamlessly Transform from human form into a bird form! - Blood and gore to leave a sweet taste in your mouth. - Steam Achievements.
